Full Tilt Poker Game #29937911949: Table King of the Hill (heads up, deep) - 500K/1000K - No Limit Hold'em - 21:40:27 ET - 2011/04/15
Seat 1: Hero (119,556,500)
Seat 2: Player0 (199,000,000)
Player0 posts the small blind of 500,000
Hero posts the big blind of 1,000,000
The button is in seat #2
*** HOLE CARDS ***
Dealt to Hero [8h 7h]
Player0 raises to 3,000,000
Hero calls 2,000,000
*** FLOP *** [8d 6c 7d]
Hero bets 5,000,000
Player0 raises to 21,000,000
Hero raises to 116,556,500, and is all in
Player0 calls 95,556,500
Players agree to Run It Twice
Hero shows [8h 7h]
Player0 shows [5d Td]
*** TURN 1 *** [8d 6c 7d] [Jd]
*** RIVER 1 *** [8d 6c 7d Jd] [9d]
*** TURN 2 *** [8d 6c 7d] [9s]
*** RIVER 2 *** [8d 6c 7d 9s] [3s]
*** SHOW DOWN 1 ***
Hero shows two pair, Eights and Sevens
Player0 shows a straight flush, Jack high
*** SHOW DOWN 2 ***
Hero shows two pair, Eights and Sevens
Player0 shows a straight, Ten high
Player0 wins pot 1 (119,556,500) with a straight flush, Jack high
Player0 wins pot 2 (119,556,500) with a straight, Ten high
*** SUMMARY ***
Total pot 239,113,000 | Rake 0
*** SUMMARY 1 ***
Pot 1 119,556,500
Board: [8d 6c 7d Jd 9d]
Seat 1: Hero (big blind) showed [8h 7h] and lost with two pair, Eights and Sevens
Seat 2: Player0 (small blind) showed [5d Td] and won (119,556,500) with a straight flush, Jack high
*** SUMMARY 2 ***
Pot 2 119,556,500
Board: [8d 6c 7d 9s 3s]
Seat 1: Hero (big blind) showed [8h 7h] and lost with two pair, Eights and Sevens
Seat 2: Player0 (small blind) showed [5d Td] and won (119,556,500) with a straight, Ten high
